message: Clarification for a popular recent rumor.
story: Mohamed Oun shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Open Whisper Systems >> Blog >> There is no WhatsApp 'backdoor'
caption: whispersystems.org
description: There is no WhatsApp 'backdoor' moxie0 on 13 Jan 2017 Today, the Guardian published a story falsely claiming that WhatsApp's end to end encryption contains a "backdoor." Background WhatsApp's encryption uses Signal Protocol, as detailed in their technical whitepaper. In systems that deploy Signal Pr...
